reviews.review_text: Great beer and really good food too! My favorite place to have a burger and a beer. I love everything on the menu from their wings to sandwiches and even eggs. I just wonder why they don t have a club sandwich. They have a great grilled chicken burger and a mean BLT but no club sandwich. I would love to see a club sandwich on the menu!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Cathalino!

reviews.review_text: This place hit the spot.  The fish burger was huge! and delicious  the flight was 4x6ox for $9, great deal! But above all, the vibes were great. This place reminds me of my dad who was a trucker. They had live music with Dino, who was excellent. The sunset was hitting our table just right which gave it a memorable evening. The red truck out front was a nice photo-op.

I recently visited Red Truck Restaurant in Vancouver and had a great time. I would highly recommend Red Truck Restaurant for their delicious salad, generous portion sizes, impressive beer selection, and great live music. If youre looking for a fun and tasty dining experience in Vancouver, this is definitely a spot to check out!

This is one of the best breweries i have ever been to and i am a brewery connoisseur. The views of the massive tanks through the windows are a marvel to look at. The service is incredible, the staff always gives the best customer service experience. They have a fantastic selection of beer as well. Perfect place for an anniversary drink
Awesome food, great beer (can t beat their original lager) and service. One of my favourite breweries in BC!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hark, we appreciate your review and are happy to hear we are one of your favourite breweries! Hope to have you back again.

reviews.review_text: The ambience was nice.  The fish and chips had a really nice flaky crust and the bbq hotdog had well flavored brisket that was not fatty.  The beer was solid but we were hoping for at least one darker beer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great feedback Carol!

reviews.review_text: Great place for a bite and bev. Their food and drink menu is decent. Patio space is adequate and so is parking. Wings special on Wednesday ($3 off), beef brisket sando was delicious. Would def be back.

Great meeting place as I come from the North Shore & meet friends downtown. Always easy, free and safe parking for their bikes & my car. And now some of us bring our dogs too - which prompted me to write this joyous review! The live music starts early enough that we can soak that in as well.

My first time dining at Red Truck Beer with my hubby and brothers after work.  Recommended by hubby who goes there with his co-workers.  We were meeting my hubby at Red Truck Beer.  My brother drove me and when we rolled into the parking lot I didnt expect its where craft beer is brewed.  My hubby did the ordering as he was there first with garlic fries and wings. You need to order at the counter and pay first.  Youll get a number to take to your table which helps the server to bring your order to the correct table. I had the Fish Sandwich which had beer battered cod, lettuce, tomatoe and siriracha mayo with side salad (gotta had something healthy right?) :). It was a large sandwich and flavourful.  With the crunch from the beer battered cod and freshness from vegetables this was a great start to a weekend. My brothers ordered Smoke Brisket Sandwich and Sante Fe Eggs so I cant really comment other than they enjoyed their meal. Great times at Red Truck Beer!  I cant have alcohol but still had a great time at Red Truck Beer!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for coming by and taking the time to let us know about your visit. We hope to see you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: Best place for a beer had my 68 year old birthday and got so drunk I broke my walker on my way out. Big Betty my neighbour had her first kiss with a women on the patio. Thanks Justyn and Jack for the birthday wishes and for my new walker L.O.L

HOLY RED TRUCK!!! WOW...BRAVO ZULU! At work today debating what to do for lunch.....so online i went. The picture alone of their menu, amazing! I said why not.....GLAD I DID!!! The asian bbq wings, SUPER DELICIOUS! Wow...felt like i was overseas again.... in the honk kong asian market at fenwick pier! That tang....sweet...spicey, all in one. THATS NOT ALL! Then...the BBQ Footlong. That very first bite, felt like i was in Wrigley Field at a Live Ball game!  I swear, i dont why this is my first time.....BUT DEFINITELY NOT MY LAST!  You will not regret guys. PLUS, I ordered on Skip and it was in my mouth in about 32 mins. BRAVO ZULU!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 stars and awesome review! We appreciate you taking the time to review us and hope to see you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: That chicken burger is absolutely delicious. I had it on my first visit. Ive been here 5 times now. The chicken burger was so good, I have not even bothered trying anything else. I beg for it each time I return. One issue with this area, is youll occasionally see hypodermic needles lying around outside. Watch your step. Nothing against this restaurant. Its just the area its located in. I still highly advise visiting this restaurant/brewery. Its great.

This brewery has one of the best locations in town. Long tables works perfect for large groups. They have brew tours and a very good selection of beer. The bourbon ale its for me there best beer. They have live music Fridays and Saturdays. The food menu is amazing and the grilled cheese its definitely by itself a reason to visit red truck.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Alonso! Glad you enjoyed yourself, hope to see you here again soon!

reviews.review_text: I have been to many breweries in Vancouver and Red Truck is definitely in my top three. Its a large space which means you have more of a chance of finding a space, the decor inside and out is very in keeping with the name of the brewery and the cool old school trucks help with this vibe. There is wheelchair accessible entrance and also a disabled toilet on the main floor. The menu is quite varied but I have to say if you are looking for something healthy you will definitely struggle, even their salads arent amazingly healthy with creamy dressings etc. However, if your looking for a roadside truck stop classic this is the place! The beer is great and they always have tons of variety and seasonal specials, most of the staff are friendly and all of them are knowledgeable about the beer. Go make a pit stop there!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the in-depth review Natalie! Were really happy you enjoyed yourself--hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: This is a great brewery not too far from Central Vancouver. I ordered a flight where I was able to sample four of their beers. The Oktoberfest (seasonal) and the stout were my favorites! It is definitely a must if youre visiting breweries in Vancouver. Also, the food smells incredible!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review James, we really appreciate the feedback.

reviews.review_text: One of the better Microbrewery! Great ambiance and the food is delicious  . They also have one of best prices off sales in town. Check out their Growler fill up Happy Hours (see pic) The beer is clean and well balanced. from the offset it looks like a giant American corporation but apparently it s not, it s a bunch of local talented people who knew how to build and run a brand. Everything about the experience feels natural and well thought out... and their concert series should be something to watch out for.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your kind review, Viken. We are very much a small, independent craft brewery that started in North Vancouver in 2005 and has since moved to our new location as of August 2014. We look forward to continuing deliver the freshest beer on four wheels and exceeding your expectations in the future.

reviews.review_text: A laid-back, no-nonsense microbrewery in East Vancouver, Red Truck offers a good selection of highly drinkable beers and tasty bar snacks. The large patio, friendly service, and funky theme decor enhance the overall experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review!

reviews.review_text: Great Brewery with lots of space and seating, tasty food and music! We had some great beers. They have some you can buy and take away if you find something that you like. Great food options! I had a Chicago hot dog and fries which was perfect for having a couple of beers. Very tasty and high quality. They had a great musician playing. It was lively and super fun.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Lianne! Were happy to hear you had a good time. Hope well see you back again soon!

reviews.review_text: While this is not my go to place for beer in Vancouver this place has the best food out of all the beer company/ breweries I have been to in Vancouver. I have been here prepandemic and currently but I keep going back for their food and friendly service. With COVID they have such a clear entry exit setup and all the tables are well distanced. Their fries are so good whether you get the poutine or chili cheese ones or my favourite ones; I DEFINITELY recommend the buffalo fries with blue cheese! Aint nothing hit the spot like one of those!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5* review Danika.  We take pride in offering high standards and have ensured throughout the pandemic to make it a safe space for our customers and employees.  We look forward to seeing you again!

reviews.review_text: Was a really good experience, well done for the staff, burgers really good and the fries with garlic are the best, the beer and the facilities another 100 points Well done, we will be back soon
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the raving review Antonio!  We look forward to seeing you soon for a fresh beer, cheers!

reviews.review_text: Havent been yet but really enjoy your beers. My new favorite is the baja light. Im stocking up for the summer. Absolutely awesome, super enjoyable
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mike, glad to hear youre enjoying Baja Light!

reviews.review_text: Awesome brewery, my favorite  beer of all time is the classic lager it never gets old. Staff are very kind and friendly and it was a super  chill place to visit have a bite to eat. Highly recommend  coming by and checking it out it beats lining up at the BCL anyday.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your epic review. Cheers.

reviews.review_text: As someone who is extra weary of covid, I gotta say these guys are taking every possible precaution -- spaced out tables, out door patios, all staff are masked, QR codes for menus, controlled entry, sanitizers at the entrance, constantly disinfecting, etc... This place has always had great food/drinks/service.  Im super happy that theyre staying open and doing it safely.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mark.  Thanks for the 5* review!  We have taken every precaution for the diner here, and trained the staff to keep up to the standards we hold.  Keep safe out there and thanks for the continued support!

reviews.review_text: Great spot to stop in for tasty beers! Make sure to try the Paloma Wheat!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5-star review Stuart!

reviews.review_text: Baja light is the closest I have come to  Mexican beer and I love it. Also super happy that it is sold in bottles.  That is, in fact, what motivated me to buy a case in the first place.  Thanks.
Super cool brewery feel.    Great selection for flight testing. Had myself the breakfast sandwich, I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 start review and we re glad we could exceed your expectations. Cheers.

reviews.review_text: John our tour guy was great with explaining all about the beer red truck produces and where the company started and came about. Thank you for you hospitality and the beer tasting. I had a great time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rena! Thank you for the kind words--we will be sure to pass the message along to John! Hope to see you back again soon :)

reviews.review_text: One of the best breweries in vancouver! Great place to go with friends and drink a beer! All the beers are great and food is really good! I will go again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ariel!  We love having you!

reviews.review_text: Food was fast with lots of classic options. Grilled cheese was particularly good. Beer was good enough. The kids loved the red truck out front (they can even sit in it!)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: The brewery is a really cool place for kids to visit!  Lots to see and play on.  We love dogs and bikes as well!

reviews.review_text: Go get a beer here! If you are in Vancouver red truck is the place to go. Everything about them asserts their position as the best craft brewery in Vancouver. Purposeful decor that matches the theme of the business, a great patio to relax on, bike fixing station for if you may have tied one on, good food, and fair prices. The experience in the brewery tonight changed my clearly wrong perception of the brand when I walked past their bottles in the BCL. Great work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for these kind words Evan! We really appreciate everything you said in your review--its amazing to hear our customers enjoying our brewery as much as we do. Hope youll be back soon!

reviews.review_text: I really like the exterior of this place. Inside you can do tastings and fill your growler. Definitely a great place to come with friends!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Evangeline!

reviews.review_text: Went there last night and the food was great. The vibe was nice as well and the beers were nice and tasty. I really want to highlight our server. She was so attentive and checked in often to ensure everything was great. Red Truck you have got a gem! Thank you Sasha!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience this past weekend! We will pass on your comments to Sasha. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Food was amazing service was super nice and the environment is amazing plays nice music and the place is super tidy
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing review Addison!

reviews.review_text: Beer is good, food is good and service is good. Very relaxing place to spend a few hours.

Not a perfect visit to red truck..the first waiter did not understand what i said to him. ..and we ended up waiting to order instead of ordering at the counter as they normally do.  No blame..dude looked a bit beat up.  The other service staff. Seemed in charge,  red braids, into it attitude got us back on the road though.   Burgers wer pretty standard..fresh and tasty. Fries were salted to a perfect charm. The baja lager was served cold and was super enjoyable.  The mac and cheese is a good option from the sides menu.  Theres a certain ingredient that is unique to the dish amd makes a good pair with the beer i had.  Food came quickly after we ordered and was the proper temperature..side sauces i ordered were full and plenty for our portions.  Would take a bro friend (beer flights looked interesting) or a girl that doesnt need a whole lit of doting and likes to eat.  The bathrooms here are a total experience i didnt see the womens naturally but the mens was custums sinks and faucets and all dark stained wood..a+ and with the theme.  5 stars for the redirect with service staff and great food ..fully loaded burger for under 20 is nice... would recommend/go back to try more beer and have the mac and cheese again.  The menu was full of options...but i stuck to basic bacon cheese  burg.  Totally filling and prepared well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Louie - thanks for taking the time to do a review and send your great comments about your recent visit to the Truck Stop at Red Truck. I will pass on your feedback to the team as they will appreciate the feedback. We hope to see you again soon! Cheers!!

reviews.review_text: Beer is pretty good, the amber and blackberry bourbon ale are my favorites. They also have a good food menu and serve Nathans hot dogs.
Great assortment of beer and comfort food favorites. Live music weekly and on theme decor. Loved going here and will definitely go back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review John!

reviews.review_text: Was in with a group on Friday and had a wonderful time. Fantastic beers, very accommodating staff and a killer playlist. Thanks for having us!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your great review Aidan! Hope to see you again at the Truck Stop Diner

reviews.review_text: Great place to have food and fresh delicious beers!

Never would have thought but the fries are GREAT here! Grilled cheese (it s actually a melt) was also excellent and filling. Ordered a flight of beer with the helpful guidance of their staff and loved every single one. Their sours are perfectly sour, I had to order a pint. Prices are very reasonable. Music is a little loud but I loved the atmosphere. You definitely can only chat with the person next to and across from you. Fun place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review! We take great pride in offering amazing diner classics, prepared simply, and done right.

reviews.review_text: Good food, great beer. Whats not to love?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review!

reviews.review_text: I have to say, the customer service and quality of beer at this local establishment are both top shelf variety. I mentioned to them about a possible problem in production they might be having, and they corrected the problem, and went the extra mile. Don t buy Bud, buy BC. So many great local breweries, we are spoiled here in the lower mainland. The folks at Red Truck are top notch!
Really good food, flights and fills here!
1st time at Red Truck so I tried a few beers. Very yummy. Great covid-19 protocols also. Thanks so much, Ill be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re glad you enjoyed your time and we really appreciate the awesome 5 star review. Can t wait to have you join us again.

reviews.review_text: Nice place..nice people there...and nice beer

I had the Texas burger and the amber ale. Very tasty meal. The chairs were a touch wobbly, but thats okay. The atmosphere was great and their aesthetic was on point. Also, the washroom is so friggen cute. You should definitely check it out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Vincent! We have passed your feedback about the chairs along to our Manager to make sure any issues are resolved. Hope to see you back soon!

reviews.review_text: Love the Midnight run dark lager   wish there is a 8 pack

Happy to see Red Truck reopened now. System working well, servers have been positive and we saw them cleaning between customers. Outside raised deck using the 4 corners only with tables for groups of 6 or less. Lower level has 5-6 picnic tables in enclosed area. Tables inside well spaced. Good and beer still good too:)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your support and great review.. Cant wait to have you back again. Cheers!

reviews.review_text: The brisket sandwiches are amazing. This place is a little pricey but its totally worth it if you are feeling like a treat once in awhile. Ive also tried the chicken tacos and bacon cheeseburger. Both were great!
Delicious - the fish sandwich was amazing and I purchased a shirt and they went over and above and got me a single beer togive to my husband of a new one they were brewing
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Kirsten!

reviews.review_text: Cool brewery with rotating taps and a nice food menu.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Jessica, keep an eye out on new brews we will be crafting up this fall.

reviews.review_text: Marcus the beer rep is amazing. He might need a raise. He took such good care of me at the signature liquor store in Kelowna. Ill make a point of buying your beer more often as a thank you to him.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the shout out for Marcus! He works really hard and is an amazing part of the Red Truck Team. I will let him know about your comments... and thanks for supporting Red Truck Beer. Reach out to us anytime with comments or feedback. Enjoy!!

reviews.review_text: Mitch was a great help. Had Pineapple Hefeweizen, Lime Pepper, Kettle Sour, and the Berry Bourbon Ale, and it was 4 for 4 hits. Top notch stuff. The Red Truck Dog was delicious. Helpful staff, safe place to eat during COVID-19, and a great general vibe. Red Truck was already my fave, but the brewery is even better.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for taking the time to review us Jonathan!  We have passed our thanks onto Mitch.  We will keep striving for excellence and we look forward to seeing you next time!

reviews.review_text: Best hotdog of my life. Yummy yum

I am surprised that I never rated this excellent brewery before. I have been enjoying their wonderful staff, great food, and outstanding selection of beers for quite awhile now.  In fact, I have a can of Defender Bourbon Ale in hand right now.  Mmmm...!  I come here from Spruce Grove, near Edmonton, quite often, and visit the store or pub every time. I have found only one store in Spruce Grove that stocks a limited selection of Red Truck.  If I can in any way help you remedy that distressing situation let me know! Thanks for your great product!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Pat, we have always appreciated your ongoing support here at Red Truck.  Be sure to drop in soon for another fresh beer!

reviews.review_text: A great Micro brewery.  Normally food at microbreweries is limited and although limited at Red Truck, you have to give extra points for having Nathans Coney Island hot dogs.  Went to Red Truck on a sunny weekend and sat on the patio in the sun.  It was a great experience.  Not for people seeking line and fine dining, but if youre into Microbreweries this is an excellent choice.  Good beer and service.  Great patio.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Martin, glad you had a great time, and we hope to see you back soon!

reviews.review_text: Good selection of lagers on tap. Good comfort food too like ballpark hotdogs. Their food menu is meant to reflect a truck stop and the food is upgraded for an urban environment.

Red Truck has a great atmosphere and friendly staff. I enjoy the live music and events held at the brewery. There is an amazing patio for the summer which is enclosed and heated for the winter. One suggestion would be to lower the volume during live shows. Sometimes it can be hard to have a conversation with the person across the table.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Dylan!

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff. Cool truck/beer motif. Great food at a decent price. Good beer. I had the Breakfast Hamburger on a long weekend Monday. The burger with fries and a beer was $14 on the weekend brunch menu. The beer was 22oz instead of 16oz because it was Monster truck Monday. I enjoyed the red pilsner. The burger was tasty and large. The fries were hot, crispy and tasty - I salt and pepper them to my taste. This brewery is right off of the Central Greenaway bike route and has a couple of bike racks for locking up. I will definitely consider returning and recommend to others.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Rick, we cant wait to have you back! Were huge bike fans ourself, so the brewery placement may not have been by accident. We also just installed a new bike tuning station. Perfect for those summer rides.

reviews.review_text: Awesome food and drinks. Unexpectedly large variety of food choice. Beers on tap are cheaper than restaurants.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers for the amazing 5 star review.

reviews.review_text: Had an amazing time celebrating a birthday here. The beer and food is great, and the service is incredible. Their staff are always so nice and happy, this is a most see. Also check out the bathrooms, decor is on point the whole way through this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the awesome review Cheylene! Were happy you chose Red Truck for your birthday celebrations. Hope well see you here next year :)

reviews.review_text: Red truck has simply the best staff, the best beer and the best food. Im super picky and Ive never been disappointed here. The food is always fresh, hot and tasty. Everything is made fresh, non processed and with complex taste. You wont regret coming to red truck

Like beer? No seriously... Do you like beer? Yes? Then you need to go to Red Truck Beer and enjoy beer and food. Menu is awesome. Beer is awesome. Their merch is awesome. Highly recommend their lager and IPA selection. Also... Definitely upgrade your hot dog to the foot long.
Great service, good focus on pandemic safety. Really good beer. At first the food prices may seem slightly high ($15+) but the chicken burger is one of the best things in the city.

This place was awesome. I attended a private event here, and it was great. Great food. Great BEER! Great staff. The overall atmosphere was cool, great branding. The brewery was awesome, and I really like supporting businesses who offer great product, and are participants in the local market. Cheers to Red Truck!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: It was a pleasure to host you. Really appreciate the good review--cant wait to have you back again soon!

reviews.review_text: My favorite brewery by far. I go every two months for the last few years to swap out my keg. Even wearing my mask I was recognized as a regular customer. The service is exceptional and James is the best!!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Brent, we appreciate the support over the years, cheers!

reviews.review_text: Great beer. I would definitely recommend taking the brewery tour. We had a blast going behind the scenes and learning more about the beer. And it ends in a beer tasting with a glass to take home. It s also one of the largest breweries in the city and they have free parking.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tyler! We have brewery tours Fridays 5pm - 6pm or Sat & Sun from 2pm - 5pm.

reviews.review_text: Tables were spaced out nicely. Our server Daryl was awesome; she has a great sense of humor and a positive attitude. Would come back based on this positive experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the wonderful review and will be sure to pass along your feedback to Darel.

reviews.review_text: Amazing food and beer, with friendly staff! Thanks for a great experience
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5-star review Colin!

reviews.review_text: What an amazing place! The concept is super fun, the saff Shawn & Brendan are amazing and the beers   Be sure to check out the cool bathrooms    I cant wait for summer to enjoy some bevs on their patio.

I wasnt at any place.   I am on Galiano Island and decided to grab some beers from the local store to enjoy in the hot tub.   So many unfamiliar choices on the shelves.   Grabbed some Red Truck Round Trip Amber Ale.   Dang that was some tasty beer.   Perfect with my dinner and perfect in the cliffside hot-tub.  Am a I allowed to curse on here?  G.. Da.. that was good beer!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review John, we are glad you enjoyed the beer, the Amber Ale was the first beer we ever brewed, and what more to top it off than a sweet view and cliffside hot-tub, feel free to send any photos to us for IG/Facebook in future, and well give you a shoutout.

reviews.review_text: Had the schnitzel and chicken thigh sandwhich. Both were homeruns, juicy dripping with sauce and flavour. Had 2 flights of beer, so we tried the majority. I would 100% return and encourage anyone thinking about trying this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Love it Shawn, hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great deal on beer+footlong hot dog, which was delicious. Nice atmosphere and good beer with the East Van Running Crew on Monday evenings.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for coming by and sharing your review! We hope to see you again soon. Cheers!

reviews.review_text: I love this place! I visit this place as a meeting spot with friends where we have a couple of beer and some local pub food. I always find that there are seasonal options as  well as their standard offerings. The staff is friendly and helpful and love the decor. I have also tried the axe throwing event, that was interesting.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words Paul!

reviews.review_text: Killer tap list, perfectly executed truck stop food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We love having you as a customer!  Thanks for the review.

reviews.review_text: Really great live music, super delicious beer and real dece pub food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review!  Hope to see you again soon.  We have live music every Friday and Saturday night!

reviews.review_text: Fabulous Brewery. Atmosphere was super lively, and the beer was excellent (especially the blackberry bourbon ale). Also some of the best french fries Ive ever had.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you enjoyed yourself Damon! Hope to see you back soon.

reviews.review_text: Love the ambience, the food and the drinks! Theyre currently open and following covid protocols to the T.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ramlah, we do our best to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience here, see you soon at the Truckstop!

reviews.review_text: amazing service from jack and everyone as always

Boasting one of the finest and largest facilities of any Vancouver brewery, Red Truck is like the Taj Mahal of craft beer. With a great patio, tasty food menu, their Summer Concert Series in the parking lot (complete with great bands, food trucks, great times and lots of beer) and one of the coolest bathroom sinks Ive ever seen, this is a great place for  a beer or three. Within walking distance of many other breweries, so also a must-stop on any brewery walking tour.
Very cool and unique place. Good food, great beer, and awesome aesthetics. Its a little on the pricier side, but would be fun for a chill place to hang out with some buddies.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Tyler! Were glad you enjoyed yourself--hope to see you back here soon

reviews.review_text: This is a lovely place to have a couple of beers with friends and enjoy the sunny patio in summer. Proximity to the bike route is a plus. The best part is the recent addition of Golden Ale to their beer offer. I only hope its going to become a staple.
Great beer, great experience.
Nice selection of food, great quality. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We took the kids and they loved the food too. Well be back next time were in the area.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review James! Wed be happy to host you and your family anytime :)

reviews.review_text: This place is a gem. Great service, great food (the garlic fries and the BLT are amazing) and the beer is super delicious. Great patio. Parking lot is a bit tight, great bicycle parking.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the in-depth review Drew! Glad you enjoyed yourself, hope to see you back again soon!

reviews.review_text: A great place to have a beer and some pub food. The live band was really good too! Shout out to the bathrooms that look like fuel pumps. Lots of seating and tasty beer here.
Never even realized that I liked beer until a came here. The bartender J.R. (I think?) let me sample a few of his favourite beers and I loved them all. Food is good too. Definitely coming back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by to test drive our beers, Logan. We really appreciate the 5 star review. We look forward to impressing you again. Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Their traditional beers are very good and the new flavors that they released for the summer are good too.  I recommend this place to enjoy the beers and the food.  excellent atmosphere and good service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by and sharing your wonderful feedback.

reviews.review_text: Recently purchased the Red Trucker variety pack and was really pleased with this purchase. Some of the finest beers I have tasted over the years. Will definitely be a repeat customer....cheers
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers for the awesome review and we are glad you enjoyed our delicious beers.

reviews.review_text: The beer and food is excellent. We will be going back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sheila!

reviews.review_text: Good beer. Great patio. Food is just ok. But they have a happy hour on growler fills from 4-6 everyday...$2 off
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jarrod, glad you enjoyed your beer. Which was your favourite?!

reviews.review_text: Love this place! The foods great and the beers are wonderful. The Baja beer is definitely worth a try.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your comments and for being a fan! We appreciate you taking the time to post your review! Cheers.

reviews.review_text: Amazing food and fantastic beer! The atmosphere is very inviting, open and bright. Thank you!
Terrific microbrew - great selection of beers and good food. Really nice employees!
I went here for an event and this place is great. The staff have us a tour of the brewery as well as its story and it was quite interesting. Beer was also really tasty
this place is great. the staff are great. the food is great. the beer is great. they also follow COVID protocol to a T and you feel safe there.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Joel.  It has been a priority for us to ensure all guests and customers are kept safe during this time, but can still enjoy a great atmosphere and experience.

reviews.review_text: Beer 4.5/5, Food 5/5, Atmosphere 4/5. A bit overdone in the Truck theme, but lots of seating and one of the best burger and beer combos in the city.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We love our trucks! Thanks for the review Tim, hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great beer, great food. Lots of limited special edition beers on tap. Great people working there too, its fun.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Nathan! Love the feedback!

reviews.review_text: Excellent Beer and the food is great.
Best place for a flight of beer and food!
